page_content: The page is about pedestrian and bicycle traffic in St. Gallen.
The page discusses the appeal procedures in the St. Gallen school system.
The page provides information on tender openings for cantonal contracts and includes PDF documents related to various projects, including software procurement.
The page discusses the digital transformation in St. Gallen's construction sector, including the introduction of new software for electronic building applications.
The page discusses the election of St. Gallen members to the Hochschulrat of the new Ost â€“ Ostschweizer Fachhochschule.
The page discusses the 24th meeting of the Arbeitskreis "Archivierung von Unterlagen aus digitalen Systemen" (AUdS) and provides PDF documents on digital archiving strategies and frameworks.
The page provides guides on how to integrate geoservices of the Canton of St. Gallen into various GIS systems like ESRI ArcMap and QGIS.
